description: Ready in just three steps, serve up tasty grilled lobster cooked in lime butter with a side of mango salsa at your next barbecue.
keywords: Grilled Lobster With Lime Butter And Mango Salsa
name: Grilled Lobster With Lime Butter And Mango Salsa Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer lobster to a large platter. Serve lobster with mango salsa, lime wedges, remaining coriander and bread.
